name: Contra III The Alien Wars
description:
In the year 2636, the Alien War rages on, and it's up to two soldiers, Jimbo and Sully, to stop the invasion. In this Super NES classic, you can battle through six stages of non-stop, run-and-gun action, collecting power-ups including bombs, flamethrowers, spread shots, lasers and homing guns.



Please note, this title was originally
released in Europe as "Super
Probotector: Alien Rebels".



This is the US version of the game.
